message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think it would be a perfect fit for you. I'm asking for $150 for it, but I'm open to negotiation. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your openness to negotiation. I am willing to pay $130 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite ready to go down to $130 yet. How about we meet in the middle at $140? This would still be a good deal for both of us.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I understand your position, and I am willing to increase my offer to $145 for the product.
